short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It permits just with a single click to copy an accented letter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension permits you to copy an accented letter in the clipboard. You can choose if you want to copy a lower letter or an upper letter.

If you want to leave a feedback or just report a bug, please open an issue on Github:
https://github.com/Sav22999/accented-letters-addons.
